title: So Tank ekko is still a problem i see
body: I guess there really isnt a way to fix it, but im getting tired of wasting a ban on ekko so i dont see him full tank and do all of our hp in seconds.

Gee, it's almost like making a champion with a massively overloaded kit full of utility, mobility, damage, defense and a ton of versatility in both role and build path was a BAD idea.   Seriously.  How did no one at Riot see this coming?  Ekko has basically EVERYTHING in his kit.  When they made him they said he would be a "sustained damage, skirmishing assassin".  Except "sustained damage" isn't an assassin thing, that's what fighters, bruisers and some tanks do.  They gave him the kit of a tank with assassin-type damage and scalings.  Is anyone shocked he became a monster?

Unless he loses a TON of damage (including his entire three-hit % damage passive), or he gets his utility neutered (not likely barring a rework) he'll always be obnoxious, if not just flat out OP.
